Posts.EditableText: The most important thing for me is a visual representation of the layout of the rooms, their exact sizes, the length of each path, and the exact position of each room and with exits and locks and the paths between rooms. The exception is in a game with a very simple set of rooms where there are not so many that you could possibly lose track of the layout. I like to use word documents so that I can see verbs and scripts and room descriptions all at once.
